app.aboutEatonPage.becomeGuardian.descri: What can you do to make your community, your work, your planet more sustainable?
app.aboutEatonPage.becomeGuardian.title: Become an Eaton Green Guardian
app.aboutEatonPage.growYourHandprint.des: Green Guardian Handprint lets you calculate and track your impacts with the goal of becoming Net Positive. You can watch your handprint grow to exceed your footprint and inspire others to do the same. What are footprints and handprints?
app.aboutEatonPage.growYourHandprint.tit: Be a Part of a Positive Future. Reduce your footprint. Grow your handprint!
app.aboutEatonPage.head.description: Want to take doing good to a global scale? You’re not alone. Through Handprinter, creative individual actions and outreach generate ripple effects to touch and heal your community and the globe.
app.aboutEatonPage.head.title: Welcome to Handprinter!
app.aboutEatonPage.hero.description: With Green Guardian Handprint, you can see how your individual actions create a positive impact at work, in your community and around the world.
app.aboutEatonPage.hero.title: Start tracking your enviromental impact today!
app.aboutEatonPage.whatAreHandprints.des: We’ve heard about footprints: the negative impacts of the things we buy and use. We need to reduce our footprint, but that is only a part of the story.

We also have handprints: positive impacts of our actions. Handprints include helping others reduce their footprints. Green Guardian Handprint lets Eaton employees grow their handprints and reduce their footprints too.
app.aboutHumanscalePage.footprint.text: Footprints are the sum of the negative impacts of all the activities it takes to provide each of us with the products and services we buy and use in a year, including the impacts from using and disposing of them. We each have carbon footprints, water footprints, and footprints for other kinds of impacts. We need to reduce them, but footprints are only part of the story.
app.aboutHumanscalePage.footprint.title: What are footprints?
app.aboutHumanscalePage.handprint.campai: Just take one of the actions from the Challenges! There are so many ways to shrink your footprint. Hundreds of people are using these ideas to reduce their footprints.
app.aboutHumanscalePage.handprint.takeAc: The action library is so large it can be overwhelming. If you aren’t sure where to start, check out the Challenges that are currently active. You’ll find campaigns and competitions. Each one is time-bounded and has a special theme, and a few actions to go with it.

Taking action is the key to creating positive impacts. Handprinter is an open library containing the good action ideas contributed by thousands of users around the world. And the action library grows every day. Use the search and filter features to find actions on specific topics. We want to make sure that everyone, in every country and age and circumstance can find actions that are relevant to their situation, actions that help them make a positive difference.

Strengthen and globalize the movement. Individuals and organizations can use Handprinter to track, interpret, and visualize data so that they can make informed decisions and inspire others to have a positive impact.
app.aboutHumanscalePage.handprint.text1: We can also have handprints: positive impacts that we cause in the world, including ways we help others to reduce their footprints. Handprinter lets you work with people in your neighborhood and around the world to shrink your footprint and to grow your handprint. Get started today!
app.aboutHumanscalePage.handprint.text2: With enough handprints, we can heal the planet!
app.aboutHumanscalePage.handprint.title: What is a handprint?
app.aboutHumanscalePage.hero.title: Help us to create handprints, and be part of a positive change in the world
app.aboutInterfacePage.actions.title: Take a step to reduce your carbon footprint or create a carbon handprint. Imagine the ripple effect if we all take action.
app.aboutInterfacePage.bePart.descriptio: Start small. Focus on one idea, learn a new habit.
app.aboutInterfacePage.bePart.title: Be part of the solution to global warming.
app.aboutInterfacePage.climateFit.text: The actions you take are up to you. What can you do at work, at home or in your community?
app.aboutInterfacePage.climateFit.title: The Climate Take Back Needs People To Make It Happen
app.aboutInterfacePage.hero.title: The Climate Take Back Starts With You. Take Action To Create A Climate Fit For Life
Why do we measure action impacts using time (days and hours)?

app.actionCreatePage.submitSucceededDesc: Our moderators will check your idea as soon as possible and when approved it will appear on the action page. From that moment onward all users will be able to take your action and be part of your handprint! Also, our modelers will be invited to model the impacts of your action so that those impacts can be taken into account.

app.createOrganization.basisFootprintToo: Handprint will generate an estimate of your annual footprint, for each of its environmental impact categories (climate, water, health, biodiversity, and waste) based on your economic sector and revenues.  In your profile settings you can replace this calculation with a more precise estimate of your annual (carbon) footprint from other tools or methods. Future updates to Handprinter will provide more detailed tools for users to refine their footprint calculation, identify its key drivers and hotspots, etc.

app.eatonFooter.text: Eaton is dedicated to improving the quality of life and the environment through the use of power management technologies and services. Eaton has approximately 96,000 employees and sells products to customers in more than 175 countries.
app.eatonHomePage.block.description: Eaton collaborated with Handprinter.org to offer employees a simple way to track the impact that personal actions can have on the environment. Handprinter helps you calculate and track your efforts, and see your colleagues' progress, as you get closer to the goal of becoming Net Positive by reducing your footprint and growing your handprint.
app.eatonHomePage.block.description.eato: Eaton is collaborating with Handprinter.org to offer you a simple way to track the positive impacts your personal actions can have on the environment. Handprinter helps you calculate and track your efforts to become Net Positive by reducing your footprint and growing your handprint. And, you can see your colleagues' progress along the way.
app.eatonHomePage.block.heading: Eaton brings Handprinter to nearly 100,000 employees around the world!
app.eatonHomePage.block.registerBlock.hi: Register today and become a part of a positive future.
Take action today and become a part of a positive future.
app.eatonHomePage.block.registerBlock.te: Time to put to bed the idea that just one person’s actions can’t make a difference. Now you can see what you and your nearly 100,000 co-workers can do to make your community, your work, your planet more sustainable! Register today and become a part of a positive future.

Time to put to bed the idea that just one person’s actions can’t make a difference. Now you can see what you and your nearly 100,000 co-workers can do to make your community, your work and your planet more sustainable! Register today and become a part of a positive future.

app.faqPage.0.answer: It is a measure of the impacts of all the processes it takes to provide you with everything that you buy and use and discard in the course of a year.
app.faqPage.0.question: What is my Footprint?
app.faqPage.1.answer: Footprints are estimated using a discipline called Life Cycle Assessment (LCA). People in the field of LCA have compiled databases that give us quantitative models of the global supply chains of products and services, including the environmental impacts of each step in those supply chains. At Handprinter we use the results of LCAs to estimate impacts in relation to five impact categories: climate change, human health, water depletion, biodiversity impacts, and waste.  People and organizations don’t just have a “Carbon footprint”, we have many footprints, one for each impact category.
app.faqPage.1.question: How is my Footprint measured?
app.faqPage.10.answer: The scale shows you three things at once, for the impact category that you have selected: your footprint on the left, your handprint on the right, and the ratio of your handprint to your footprint on the scale’s dial.  If your handprint is zero, the scale will continue to read zero as you take actions to reduce your footprint.  But once your handprint is bigger than zero, you can increase your “good ratio” (handprint / footprint) by reducing your footprint and by increasing your handprint.
app.faqPage.10.question: In the dashboard, what is the scale showing me?
app.faqPage.11.answer: Your network shows many of the people involved in your handprint “ripple effect.”  First, connected to you will see the handprinter users that you invited into handprinting. Then, you’ll also see the folks that each of them invited, and so-on.
app.faqPage.11.question: In the dashboard, what is the network view showing me?
app.faqPage.12.answer: From users!  Handprinter is a platform to empower humans to collaboratively figure out how we can bring our collective footprint into balance with the needs of earth’s natural systems. Human creativity is unbounded, and so is our potential to succeed together at this challenge.
app.faqPage.12.question: Where do the action ideas in Handprinter come from?
app.faqPage.13.answer:
First, our administrators are notified, and we check to make sure it isn’t spam, or a duplicate of an action already in the database, etc. If we need to, we’ll contact you to help you modify and strengthen your action idea. Then we’ll approve it.
Once your action idea has been approved, it will be in the database, visible to all handprinter users, and they can choose to take your action. You’ll see your influence grow as more and more people are inspired by your action idea.
But we won’t know the impacts of your action until the action is modeled. We have a staff of volunteer modelers standing by to estimate the impacts of new action ideas. Once your action has been modeled, the footprint reductions and handprint creations that you have caused will become known to you and others, and this will work retroactively as well.
app.faqPage.13.question: What happens when I add an action idea?
app.faqPage.14.answer: Absolutely, that’s the whole point!  As soon as it has been approved, your action idea becomes a public resource to help all of us reduce the human footprint and protect our planet for today and the future.
app.faqPage.14.question: Can other people take an action that I propose?
app.faqPage.2.answer: Each icon refers to a different impact category: climate change, human health, water depletion, biodiversity impacts, and waste.  When you click on an icon, Handprinter displays results for that impact category in the different parts of your dashboard. If you do this, and the results don’t seem to change much if at all, it means that the footprint and handprint impacts of your actions so far are very similar in terms of the fraction of your total annual footprint impacts. In other words, if your footprint is 358 days for climate and water and health, this means that your actions have reduced your climate footprint by 7 days (about 2%), and your water footprint by 7 days (2%) and your health footprint by 7 days (2%).  This is not surprising since many actions have similar benefits for different impact categories.
app.faqPage.2.question: What do those icons mean (the globe, the face, the tree, the drop, the trash can)? What happens when I click on one in the dashboard?
app.faqPage.3.answer:
In fact, LCA measures impacts in special units for each different impact category. There are even different possible ways and units to measure impact within a single impact category. These units are highly useful and informative for LCA specialists, but they don’t mean much to the rest of us.
At Handprinter we try to make your impacts more meaningful to you, by expressing each action’s impacts as a fraction of your total annual footprint. For example, planting a tree might create climate benefits equal to half of your carbon footprint. We could express this as “0.5 You-Footprints of climate change impact.” In the same way the impacts of eating a veggie burger instead of a beef burger might be equal to 1 ten-thousandth of your carbon footprint, or “0.0001 you-footprints of climate change impact.”
This is basically what Handprinter is doing, except we also take advantage of the facts that:
  • Footprints are annual: they represent one full year of impact.
  • People naturally divide years into days, hours, and minutes
  • Everyone knows what days, hours, and minutes are.
So, we can express “0.5 You-Footprints of climate change impact” as 6 months of you-impacts on climate change. And we can express “0.02 you-footprints of climate change impact” as 7 days of you-impacts on climate change.
app.faqPage.3.question: Why are impacts measured in minutes, hours, days, etc.? How can they be?
app.faqPage.4.answer:
Right now, Handprinter is simply using data for the average annual footprints of citizens in each country. So when you select your country in your profile, you establish your starting footprint. Then your footprint gets adjusted from there, as you take actions.
In the near future we’ll add a feature that lets you fine-tune your footprint estimate. There are several good online carbon footprint calculators in the web; we’ll allow you to use one, obtain your personal carbon footprint estimate, and enter it in your profile. Then we’ll use LCA data to estimate your footprints on other impact categories based on your country and your personal carbon footprint.
app.faqPage.4.question: How does Handprinter know what my Footprint is?
app.faqPage.5.answer:
Handprints are positive changes that you cause. When you replace your own shower head with a low-flow one, you reduce your footprint. When you give a low-flow showerhead to your friend, you reduce their footprint. Both of these positive benefits that you create are part of your handprint.
Note that you don’t have to be the only cause of a change, just one of the causes. Most good things that happen are caused by more than one person. And you don’t have to be a direct cause either. Most things that happen in the world are part of a chain or sequence of causes. Your handprint includes your full “ripple effects.”
Let’s say you buy a low-flow showerhead and it’s great; it is saving you money and reducing your footprint. So you buy one and give it to Maria. She uses it, loves it, and decides to buy one for Mark. Mark’s footprint is reduced, and your handprint grows if Maria wouldn’t have bought Mark the showerhead without your initial influence.
Handprinter helps you create, and trace, positive ripple effects in the world.
app.faqPage.5.question: What is my Handprint?
app.faqPage.6.answer: Think of your footprint as the “cost” of you living your life on earth for a year. It’s the environmental burden of what you choose to buy and do and use and discard during a year. Think of your handprint as the environmental gift that you give back to the world this year while you’re living your life. Your handprint consists of the good things that wouldn’t have happened without you. Your handprint is changes that you bring, outside the scope of your footprint.
app.faqPage.6.question: What is the difference between my footprint and my handprint?
app.faqPage.7.answer: Handprinter users are answering that question for you to the best of their ability! Take an action that you find in Handprinter’s actions database! Every action in the Handprinter database was suggested by somebody, and users are adding to the action database all the time. You can too.
app.faqPage.7.question: How can I reduce my footprint?
app.faqPage.8.answer: The possibilities are truly endless, but Handprinter is here to help you get started, get a feel for handprint creation, and launch a lifetime of handprinting over-achievement!  Check out this page (link to our “how it works”) page for a summary of 6 ways to create handprints. But if you want an idea right here, right now, how about helping your friend install a clothesline to dry their towels in the sun.
app.faqPage.8.question: How can I increase my handprint?
app.faqPage.9.answer: Remember that footprints and handprints can be expressed in units of time? This means, with both footprint reductions and with handprints, you can make part of your year “net positive.”  Let’s say you reduce your footprint by three days. It’s like you’re living here on earth at no environmental cost for three days! The calendar will show you living “in the green” for today and two more days.  This gives you time to ask: what else might I do?  Create a 2-day handprint, and your net-positive period will grow. How long can you extend your streak?  Can you help a friend extend theirs?
app.faqPage.9.question: In the dashboard, what is the calendar showing me?

app.forOrganizations.Cta.Title: Share and grow your positive impact
app.forOrganizations.External.Text1:
Reputation
Brand value and stakeholder support thrive when the world knows that you're transparent and serious about contributing to positive change. Handprinter is a platform that tracks and visualizes your organization's positive actions so that your efforts can flourish, speak for themselves, and spread.
app.forOrganizations.External.Text2:
Community Engagement
Encourage and support your customers' engagement so that they can become a vibrant force for good. Handprinter tracks every positive action so that companies, employees, and consumers can see the impact of their collective efforts. And remember, the possibilities for organizations on Handprinter are unlimited: schools can engage their students, events can engage their attendees, museums can engage their visitors, etc.
app.forOrganizations.External.Title:
The external 
case for handprinting
app.forOrganizations.Handprint.Text: Organizations can handprint in the 6 ways that individuals can, while also drawing upon their organization's specific strengths
app.forOrganizations.Handprint.Title: How can organizations handprint?
app.forOrganizations.Hero.Text: Grow and share your positive impacts
app.forOrganizations.Hero.Title:
Your organization
can be Net Positive
app.forOrganizations.Internal.Text1:
Engagement and Purpose
Work should have meaning and purpose. Employees want to work for companies who are striving for a better world.
app.forOrganizations.Internal.Text2:
Training 
Leading organizations want their employees to be a part of their positive impacts. Handprinting makes it data-driven, personal, and real.
app.forOrganizations.Internal.Title:
The internal
case for handprinting
app.forOrganizations.slider.slide1.text: Invite and inform other people and organizations about how they can reduce their footprints. Maybe you suggest actions relevant at home or work, to your employees, your suppliers, and others in your community. Use your public dashboard to celebrate their success.
app.forOrganizations.slider.slide1.title: Encourage other people
app.forOrganizations.slider.slide2.text: Can you provide know-how, technical assistance, and resources to other organizations in your community?How about those in your supply chain? What are some of your organization’s key strengths? Volunteering days fit in well here too.
app.forOrganizations.slider.slide2.title: Give a gift that handprints
app.forOrganizations.slider.slide3.text: Do you provide a good or service that  saves money whole also reduce footprint? If so, it’s a prime candidate for a Save Wave. Model its impacts transparently, give a few away, then watch and help the magic unfold as humanity runs with it.
app.forOrganizations.slider.slide3.title: Participate in a Save Wave
app.forOrganizations.slider.slide4.text: Maybe it’s a new product or service, or an innovation that improves an existing one. Handprints are changes that you cause, relative to business as usual, beyond the scope of your footprint (the negative impacts of what it takes to sustain your organization). A key here is tapping the creativity of your own people. Empower employees to create and share ideas; empower them to model impacts too.
app.forOrganizations.slider.slide4.title: Create your handprint idea
app.forOrganizations.slider.slide5.text: Take a special kind of action, that is Pure Positive. Planting a tree is a wonderful example. So is restoring habitat so that it purifies water and provides places for life to thrive. Organizations can do this at scale.
app.forOrganizations.slider.slide5.title: Take a Pure Positive action
app.forOrganizations.slider.slide6.text: Maybe you invite your customers to become a collective force for good, and you use your public dashboard to celebrate their success. Maybe your employees aren’t handprinting yet, so you engage them, and share successes internally with your internal dashboard. Schools have alums, cities have citizens, organizations have suppliers, and you get the picture!
app.forOrganizations.slider.slide6.title: Grow the handprinting community
app.forOrganizationsPage.head.descriptio: Want to take doing good to a global scale? You’re not alone. Through Handprinter, creative individual actions and outreach generate ripple effects to touch and heal your community and the globe.
app.forOrganizationsPage.head.title: Welcome to Handprinter!
app.header.climate.label: kg CO2e saved by You
app.header.ieDetected: You appear to be using Microsoft Internet Explorer as your web browser. Handprinter does NOT fully function in Internet Explorer. Please use a more modern browser such as Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Microsoft Edge. Thanks
app.homePage.aboutText: You might know what a footprint is: the measurement of a consumer’s negative impact on the planet, which comes from the activities that take place in a product’s or service’s life cycle. While we know that footprints need to be reduced, they are only one part of the story.
app.homePage.aboutText2: We also have handprints: the positive impact that our actions and decisions have on the world. Handprints are the key to reducing and counterbalancing our footprints. The Handprinter platform fosters an environment in which individuals and organizations can keep track of and grow their handprints as well as work together with others in local communities and around the world to expand the global handprint. Get started today!
app.homePage.aboutText2.eaton: We can also have handprints: positive impacts in the world, including ways we help others to reduce their footprints. Handprinter lets you work with your Eaton colleagues in your neighborhood or around the world to grow your handprint — and reduce your footprint too. Get started today!
app.homePage.aboutText3: With enough handprints, we can heal the planet!
app.homePage.actionsDescription: We all want to do more good than harm. Handprinter helps you live it. Add ideas and inspiration, calculate and track your impacts, watch your handprint grow to exceed your footprint. Launch and join micro-movements to reach the world and heal it.
app.homePage.actionsTitle:
Shrink your footprint,
and grow your handprint.
app.homePage.head.description: Want to take doing good to a global scale? You’re not alone. Through Handprinter, creative individual actions and outreach generate ripple effects to touch and heal your community and the globe.
app.homePage.head.title: Welcome to Handprinter!
app.homePage.hero.text: Through Handprinter, creative individual actions and outreach generate ripple effects to touch and heal your community and the globe.
app.homePage.hero.title: Want to take doing good to a global scale? You’re not alone.
app.humanscaleCta.text: The answer to reversing global warming starts with you.Your actions can have a positive impact on the planet.
app.increaseHandprintPage.description: Handprints are positive impacts of which you're a cause. When people and organizations join through your invitation, the impacts they create are part of your handprint. So invite others, and make sure they know they're welcome and they're needed.
app.increaseHandprintPage.emptyError: To send invites add at least one email
app.increaseHandprintPage.form.selectGro: Select group you want to invite to participate in the competition.
app.increaseHandprintPage.form.shareYour: Share your link with ID code
app.increaseHandprintPage.head.descripti: Want to take doing good to a global scale? You’re not alone. Through Handprinter, creative individual actions and outreach generate ripple effects to touch and heal your community and the globe.
app.increaseHandprintPage.head.title: Welcome to Handprinter!

app.increaseHandprintPage.title: Increase your handprint!
app.increaseOrgHandprintPage.title: Increase handprint of your organization!
app.interfaceCta.text: The answer to reversing global warming starts with you.Your actions can have a positive impact on the planet.
app.interfaceFooter.text: Interface, Inc. is a global commercial flooring company with an integrated collection of carpet tiles and resilient flooring. Our modular system helps customers create beautiful interior spaces which positively impact the people who use them and our planet.Our mission, Climate Take Back™, invites other companies to join us as we commit to running our business in a way that is restorative to the planet and creates a climate fit for life.
app.loginPage.head.description: Want to take doing good to a global scale? You’re not alone. Through Handprinter, creative individual actions and outreach generate ripple effects to touch and heal your community and the globe.
app.loginPage.head.title: Welcome to Handprinter!
app.loginPage.loginLink: We'll email you a magic link for a password-free login. Or you can
app.loginPage.title: Login
app.measurementPage.animation.slide1: On the day you register, your footprint is a full 365 days, and your handprint is zero. Time to change that!
app.measurementPage.animation.slide3: You can't shrink your way to positive. Start growing your handprint! Take action, share, contribute, and inspire.
app.measurementPage.animation.slide4: When your handprint becomes larger than your footprint, you're net positive!
app.measurementPage.animation.slide5: There’s no limit to how much good you can do!
app.measurementPage.Animation.Title: When your handprint exceeds your footprint, you become Net Positive
app.measurementPage.Card.Title: Impact for this card
app.measurementPage.CommonBasis.Text1: For general comparison, action impacts are expressed in relation to the average global citizen’s footprint. However, when you want to analyze your personal footprint, Handprinter narrows the scope and shows you a calculation of the impacts of your action in relation to your own footprint. You can use this information to measure and plan your behaviors. If your footprint is twice the size of the average global citizen’s footprint, then you know that taking an action with “2 days” of global citizen water benefits will reduce your water footprint by 1 day.
app.measurementPage.CommonBasis.Text2: The smaller your footprint gets, the more powerful each action will become when Handprinter calculates the action’s effect on your footprint.
app.measurementPage.CommonBasis.Title:
A common basis
for communication
app.measurementPage.head.description: Want to take doing good to a global scale? You’re not alone. Through Handprinter, creative individual actions and outreach generate ripple effects to touch and heal your community and the globe.
app.measurementPage.head.title: Welcome to Handprinter!
app.measurementPage.Hero.Text: How — and why — would we measure impacts in "days," "hours," and "minutes"?
app.measurementPage.Hero.Title: How do we measure Action Impacts and Handprints?
app.measurementPage.Impact.CategoryDescr: Each category has its own icon
app.measurementPage.Impact.CategoryTitle: You can make impacts on these categories
app.measurementPage.Impact.ListDescripti: Your impact calculated in terms of time.
app.measurementPage.Impact.Text: Every action card displays how much impact an action has, and this impact is expressed in days or hours or minutes of the average global citizen's footprint.
app.measurementPage.Impact.Title: Cut time from your footprint, create Net Positive time with your handprints
app.measurementPage.Info.Text1: We know what minutes, hours, days, and years are.
app.measurementPage.Info.Text2: So now, right away, we can know how much of an impact a given action will have on our total footprint.
app.measurementPage.Meaning.Text1: Footprints and handprints are usually measured in different units that are dependent on what type of impact we're talking about. Water footprints can be measured in gallons or liters, human health footprints can be measured in years of life lost (YLL), carbon footprints can be measured in tons of carbon dioxide (CO2), etc.
app.measurementPage.Meaning.Text2: But what does a ton of CO2 look like? Is 4,000 cubic meters of water a large or small share of my footprint? Handprinter answers these questions and explains what these measurements mean for your overall impact.
app.measurementPage.Meaning.Title: Most of us can't visualize the value of units
app.measurementPage.Precision.Text1: An action's impact depends on many factors, which means that the impact varies from person to person. When you specify your country of residence and parameterize the actions you take, you help Handprinter to take these factors into account so that it can reduce (but not altogether eliminate) the margin of uncertainty/error.
app.measurementPage.Precision.Text2: Reporting values like "4.35 days" is false precision. Handprinter restricts reporting values to round numbers (e.g., 1, 2, 5, 10, etc.). This also makes impacts easier to remember, and helps you focus on differences that truly matter.
app.measurementPage.Precision.Title: No false precision
app.measurementPage.Problem.Text1: Our solution is to relate all impacts to your footprint. Your footprint is an annual net-total, so we express your full footprint as 365 days. Therefore, 180 days would be half of your footprint, one-tenth of 1 percent of your footprint would be close to 10 hours of your footprint, and so on.
app.measurementPage.Problem.Text2: This works for all impact categories. Rather than ask for you to analyze and compare a variety units, we narrow it down to the one unit that we all understand: time.
app.measurementPage.Problem.Title:
Handprinter
interprets and simplifies
app.newsPage.title: My handprinting news
app.NotFoundPage.Description: 404 Error. Sorry, the page you’re looking for cannot be found.
app.NotFoundPage.Title: Oops.. something went wrong
app.organization.adminUsersDescription: These users can perform actions and add ideas to the organization. You can also edit the profile and invite new users on behalf of the organization.
app.organization.goal.can.foster: But you can always foster it ;)
app.organization.total.impact: The total impact of the Organization based on taken actions by all members
app.organization.total.impact.network: The impact of the organization Network.
app.ourVision.about.title: We've all heard about our negative impacts, but...
app.ourVision.head.description: Want to take doing good to a global scale? You’re not alone. Through Handprinter, creative individual actions and outreach generate ripple effects to touch and heal your community and the globe.
app.ourVision.head.title: Welcome to Handprinter!
app.ourVision.hero.title: With enough handprints we can heal the planet
app.ourVision.negativeImpacts.text: Your footprint is the sum of all the negative impacts that are derived from the activities that go into producing, using, and disposing the products and services that you purchase in a year.
app.ourVision.negativeImpacts.title: What is my Footprint?
app.ourVision.negativeImpactsItem1.text: Global chains of activities provide us with the products and services that we use. Even locally grown vegetables have a global supply chain when you take a closer look at their life cycle.
app.ourVision.negativeImpactsItem1.title: Global supply chains
app.ourVision.negativeImpactsItem2.text: Each activity in a supply chain can have a negative impact. All the negative impacts across a product's supply chain are what composes its footprint.
app.ourVision.negativeImpactsItem2.title: A footprint for every product
app.ourVision.negativeImpactsItem3.text: The impacts of a single product are diverse. They can include water and air pollution, degradation of ecosystems, human health impacts, and more.
app.ourVision.negativeImpactsItem3.title: Many footprints actually
app.ourVision.negativeImpactsItem4.text: My annual footprint is the sum of all the impacts from the life cycles of the products and services that I use in a year: the global cost of my lifestyle.
app.ourVision.negativeImpactsItem4.title: Daily steps to yearly totals
app.ourVision.slider.text: There are so many ways to shrink your footprint. Start by doing one of the actions from the list!
app.ourVision.slider.title:
Reducing your footprint
is a great place to start
app.ourVision.step1.text: Inform, encourage, and inspire existing members by showing them what actions you have taken to reduce your footprint and expand your handprint. Friends, associates, and organizations can see, track, and be influenced by the actions of the global network.
app.ourVision.step1.text.eaton: Encourage, inform, and inspire existing members about how they can reduce their footprints, recommending existing actions to your colleagues. Maybe invite them to try an action that recently worked for you.
app.ourVision.step1.title: Encourage other people
app.ourVision.step2.text: Take encouragement a step further. From helping your friend start a herb garden, to giving your employees reusable mugs, there are countless ways to help others take action.
app.ourVision.step2.title:
Give a gift that
handprints
app.ourVision.step3.text: Sustainability can mean cost-effective. Investing in smart sustainable practices and lifestyles is proven to have long-term economic benefits. You can participate in a Save Wave by using some of the money that you save from engaging in sustainable practices (e.g., switching to LED light bulbs) to purchase a sustainable product or service for another person or organization. Invite them to be a part of the wave.
app.ourVision.step3.title: Participate in a Save Wave
app.ourVision.step4.text: After trying out a new idea, you can share it and help others to understand how it works.
app.ourVision.step4.title: Create a new handprint idea and share it with the world
app.ourVision.step5.text: This type of action creates new positive impacts, some of which are measurable in footprint units (Life Cycle Assessment). From planting a tree, to conserving habitats, you can encourage ecosystems to flourish and life to thrive.
app.ourVision.step5.title:
Take a Pure
Positive action
app.ourVision.step6.text: Strengthen and globalize the movement. Individuals and organizations can use Handprinter to track, interpret, and visualize data so that they can make informed decisions and inspire others to have a positive impact.
app.ourVision.step6.text.eaton: Strengthen and globalize the movement. Individuals and organizations can use Handprinter to track, interpret, and visualize data so that they can make informed decisions and inspire others to have a positive impact.
app.ourVision.step6.title: Grow the handprinting community
app.ourVision.steps.title: How can I develop and expand my handprint?
app.ourVision.stepScheme.text1: You buy an LED light bulb and save money.
app.ourVision.stepScheme.text2: Use some of the money you saved to buy two more bulbs, and gift them to friends.
app.ourVision.stepScheme.text3: They save money too, and then they decide to buy their friends LED light bulbs. The Save Wave continues.
app.ourVision.what.subtitle: What is my handprint?
app.ourVision.what.text: Handprints are positive impacts that you create, beyond the boundaries of your own footprint. They are the actions and decisions that you make, such as riding your bike to work or recycling materials, that offset your footprint.
app.ourVision.what.title: But I want to be truly positive, not just less bad.
app.pages.footprint.alert.text: We recommended that you double check your estimate, including the units, to be sure of your value.
app.pages.footprint.alert.title: Wow, that's really low value for an annual carbon footprint!
app.pages.footprint.listOfNoCostCarbon: Here is a list of no-cost carbon footprint calculators that we recommend. If you would recommend another one to users of Handprinter, please contact us, thanks!
app.pages.footprint.personalizedFootprin: Handprinter uses published data to provide users with an estimate of their starting footprints based on their country of origin. However, within a country, people vary widely in their actual footprint for a host of reasons including travel habits, housing, diet, and more. Therefore, Handprinter allows you to adjust your starting footprint estimate.

To do this, you can use any of several available carbon footprint calculators (see some suggestions below) to calculate a personalized estimate of your carbon footprint, and enter the result into Handprinter. Then Handprinter uses “normalization data” from the ReCiPe method of Life Cycle Impact Assessment, for different regions of the world, to estimate your footprint for impacts for other impact categories based on your carbon footprint.
app.pages.footprint.usePointDecimalSepar: Please, use point as a decimal separator
app.pages.groups.confirm: Are you sure that you want to delete this group?
app.pages.groups.createGroupSubTitle: Always Look On The Bright Side Of Life
app.pages.privacyPolicy.paragraph.1: During registration, Handprinter only collects your name, email address, and country.  During your use of the platform you also have the option to upload a photo (or other image).  During use of the platform you have the option to take, suggest, and propose new actions.  During use of the platform you have the option to change at any time how this information is shared (or not) with other users of the platform.  And at any time, you may opt to delete your account, in which case all of your personal data will all be deleted. Information use within the platform and how to control it are described in more detail below.
app.pages.privacyPolicy.paragraph.2: Email address: We use your email address ONLY in order to communicate with you in situations such as re-setting your password, and to enable your friends and colleagues who also use Handprinter to send you information such as action suggestions. We will not otherwise share your email with any person or organization.
app.pages.privacyPolicy.paragraph.3: Name: We use your name ONLY to personalize your user experience, and to refer to you in the network diagram of Handprinter users to whom you have allowed access to read your name, and to refer to you in news feeds to about actions being taken by Handprinter users, to users to whom you have allowed access to read your name. We will not otherwise share it with any person or organization.
app.pages.privacyPolicy.paragraph.4: We use your country in order to estimate your footprint. To Handprinter users with whom you have not shared access to your name, we will simply refer to you as “A user in [your country].”\nWe will not share your country location with any person or organization.
app.pages.privacyPolicy.paragraph.5: Actions: During use, Handprinter stores information that you submit about actions that you take or suggest, and action ideas that you submit. The sole purposes for which this information are: to encourage you and others to take such positive actions, and relatedly to assess the impacts of actions taken by members of the handprinting community. Information about actions taken is shared in news feeds with other Handprinter users. We will not use it for other purposes nor otherwise share it with any person or organization.
app.pages.privacyPolicy.paragraph.6: Photo: You may opt to upload a photo or other image by which you may be associated, for sharing within the platform. We use this image ONLY to personalize your user experience, and to provide a unique visual reference to you in the network diagram of Handprinter users to whom you have allowed access to view this image, and when referring to you in news feeds about actions being taken by Handprinter users, to users to whom you have allowed access to view this image. It is also used to help personalize email messages that you choose to send from within the platform. We will not otherwise share it with any person or organization.
app.pages.privacyPolicy.paragraph.7: Controlling Information Sharing: You can control which users are allowed to see your name, photo, and dashboard within the platform.  You can make changes to these settings at any time.
app.pages.privacyPolicy.paragraph.8: Deleting your Account: You can also choose to delete your account and terminate use of Handprinter at any time. If you delete your account, then Handprinter deletes all your personal data: Your name, password, country location, and photo.  Handprinter will no longer retain this information.  All that will remain is an unnamed node in the causal network, with a record of the actions that this unnamed person took.  This information is retained because it contributes to the handprints of other people who directly or indirectly caused the actions that you took.
app.pages.privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
app.pages.termsOfUse.title: Terms of use
